text: 2.2 2 Ko 11.13, 2 Pi 2.1, 1 Jo 4.1, Lep 2.9, 2.13, 2.19, 3.1, 3.8, 3.15 Okok tap nɨbi gɨpɨm ak, wog kɨles gɨl, gɨ dad amɨl koslam mɨdɨl, pen yɨlɨk ma nepɨm ak, nepin agak. Bɨ tɨmel gɨpal okok kɨlop nɨgem, nɨbop tep ma gup agak. Bɨ ogɨnap anɨgɨl apal, Chɨn bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok mɨdobun apal agak. Pen mel ak, kɨli anɨgɨl ma mɨdebal agak. Takaw kɨlop yɨgɨlɨl nepɨm, bɨ takaw yepɨs agep okok agak.
